ygData.subject: Re: New items in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: The night of the event I heard GM s say the undead will stay in Kithicor Forest.  Last I checked the Rathe Server still didn t have them due to that nasty
ygData.messageBody:
The night of the event I heard GM's say the undead will stay in Kithicor
Forest. Last I checked the Rathe Server still didn't have them due to that
nasty little problem that happened after the event.
But GM's said the Kithicor was no longer a safe zone.

***************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 24 Human Cleric of The Rathe
***************************


> From: "Cliff, Monty" <mcliff@...>
>
>
> I was under the impression that these undead creatures were just part of
> the event for opening the plane of hate. Can anyone confirm that these
> creatures are still spawning? That morning star looks nice.
>
> Drogo
